namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t candidate_id,
                                uint64_t cur_term,
                                uint64_t last_log_index,
                                uint64_t last_log_term,
                                uint64_t* ask_term,
                                bool_t *vote_granted) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  Log_info("Inside SendRequestVote RPC %d", site_id);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [ask_term,vote_granted](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        // uint64_t ret1;
        // bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *ask_term;
        fu->get_reply() >> *vote_granted;
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, candidate_id, cur_term, last_log_index, last_log_term, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t to_site_id,
                                  uint64_t leader_term,
                                  siteid_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_index,
                                  uint64_t prev_log_term,
                                  uint64_t leader_commit_index,
                                  vector < pair<uint64_t, shared_ptr<Marshallable>>> append_log,
                                  uint64_t* followerAppendOK,
                                  uint64_t* ask_term,
                                  uint64_t* ask_index,
                                  uint64_t* ask_log_length) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  *followerAppendOK = 0;
  *ask_term = 0;
  *ask_index = 0;
  *ask_log_length = 0;

  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == to_site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOK, ask_term, ask_index, ask_log_length, to_site_id](Future* fu) {


        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ask_term;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ask_index;
        fu->get_reply() >> *ask_log_length;
        Log_info("Got response AppendEntries ;from site %lu, followerAppendOK %d, ask_term  %d, ask_index  %d, ask_log_length  %d",
            to_site_id, *followerAppendOK, *ask_term, *ask_index, *ask_log_length);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      vector < pair<uint64_t, MarshallDeputy> > append_log_md;
      for (auto &x: append_log) {
        MarshallDeputy md(x.second);
        append_log_md.push_back(make_pair(x.first, md));
      };

      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, to_site_id, leader_term, leader_id, 
                prev_log_index, prev_log_term, leader_commit_index, append_log_md, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

void RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t leader_id,
                                  uint64_t leader_term,
                                  uint64_t leader_commit_index,  
                                  siteid_t to_site_id, 
                                  uint64_t *response) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  // Log_info("Inside RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries site_id %lu", site_id);
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == to_site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [response](Future* fu) {
        //bool_t followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> *response;
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, leader_id, leader_term, leader_commit_index, to_site_id, fuattr);
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
